title: Encode into Milvus
description: Invokes a machine learning model to encode a field and store it into Milvus.

skip.title: Skip This Stage
skip.description: Set to true to skip this stage.

label.title: Label
label.description: A unique label for this stage.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Define a conditional script that must result in true or false. This can be used to determine if the stage should process or not.

modelId.title: Model ID
modelId.description: ID of Model used to encode the vector

modelOutputVector.title: Encoder Output Vector
modelOutputVector.description: The name of the model output vector that stores the encoded data.

fieldToEncode.title: Field to Encode
fieldToEncode.description: Name of field to encode and store in Milvus.

milvusCollection.title: Milvus Collection Name
milvusCollection.description: The name of the collection in Milvus that will be used to store the model output vector.

failOnError.title: Fail on Error
failOnError.description: Flag to indicate if this stage should throw an exception if an error occurs while generating a prediction for a document.
